pullRequest.title: [7.x] PLANNER-2068: KIE server can't handle OptaPlanner solver configs that use scanAnnotatedClasses when new task assignment extension is in classpath (regression)

nodes.bodyText:
Good work on code style, unit testing, etc.
Can we move this Set<String> scanExcludedPackages into ScanAnnotatedClassesConfig as List<String> packageExcludeList instead?
https://github.com/kiegroup/optaplanner/blob/7.x/optaplanner-core/src/main/java/org/optaplanner/core/config/domain/ScanAnnotatedClassesConfig.java#L49
Motivation: it fits better there next to the include list, I'd argue. All this is public API that - even in 7.x - we must support for a number of years.
From kie server, it would mean not creating the SolverFactory directly from the XML, but using SolverConfig.create() first (so if and only if a SolverConfig.getScanAnnotatedClassesConfig() is not null, its exclude list must be modified) before creating the SolverFactory with SolverFactory.create(solverConfig). Wdyt?
